name: Dizzy Lizzy
description:
Drag the mouse in the direction you want Lizzy to roll. You can change direction while in movement to avoid obstacles or to catch flies and mosquitoes to increase the score. Addictive challenging gameplay.

Giant enemies will appear once the score is high enough. Join Lizzy in this adventure, infinite runner (roller). Includes:

🔹 Boss fights

🔹 Spiders, scorpions, bees, snakes, etc.

🔹 Brutal mode

🔹 All skins unlocked

Lizzy Stradlin was playing his bass guitar when a fire started. He now has to escape at full speed causing mayhem. Being so careless could get him hurt! Pactice makes perfection.

Dizzy Lizzy is also available for free on Google Play

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.onemeal.LAgartija
